TopicTitle: How about not making me quit FIVE (5) times?

Articles.Content:
Getting out of KSP is an endeavor (not least because it's hard to stop playing, but even after I muster up the determination to do that, it's a long hike and those who aren't truly dedicated to the task may lose their will along the way).  First, I have to "quit" the rocket I'm flying and go back to the KSC. Then I have to "quit" to the main menu. Then I have to "quit" back to the top menu.  Then I finally get an option that says "quit".  But wait!  I'm not done!  I then have to confirm that I really want to quit, because apparently the multiple things I've done just to reach that point aren't sufficient evidence that yes, I really am trying to get back to my desktop.

Is there any possibility at all we can get a "quit to desktop" option from anywhere in the game?  Maybe with a confirmation dialog in case somebody clicks it by accident... I don't mind TWO actions to quit, but five is ridiculous.
I actually thought it was some stupid rant for a sec, but was surprised it isn't. I agree. Sth like this would be nice, though I would probably still click the red X because I play in windowed mode.

Yup, quit to desktop would be nice...
ESC > Quit to Desktop > "Are you sure?": Yes

Meanwhile, I just save and ALT+F4... If I have to wait 3 hours for the game to load (too many mods ), I won't wait for the game to quit

Edit:
Perhaps even a "Save and Quit to Desktop" and a "Quit to Desktop without saving"
